articles.content: Actor Sara Ali Khan sheepishly admitted in an interview that she could possibly have bullied Ananya Panday back in school. Sara was Ananya’s senior at the Dhirubhai Ambani International School in Mum… [+1399 chars]

articles.title: Gemini Daily Horoscope for Dec 24: Good news is predicted on the domestic front - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Dear Gemini, things may go smoothly on the family front and someone in the family may get promoted and make you feel proud. You have a stable financial condition. Good news is predicted on the domestic front, so be ready for it. | Horoscope
articles.content:
GEMINI (May 21-Jun 21)

articles.title: Jr NTR, Ram Charan shake a leg with Krushna and Kiku Sharda to Naacho Naacho on TKSS - India Today
articles.description: Jr NTR, Ram Charan, SS Rajamouli and Alia Bhatt will be seen promoting RRR on The Kapil Sharma Show next weekend, They shot for the episode today, December 23.
